fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player at night. If they were also attacked by another player, your attack is upgraded to Unstoppable.
- Spend a day preparing for a ritual. During the next day, everyone who you've killed at night will be revived as a minion. They will have their original roles, but their goals are changed to: "Ensure the Wicked Necromancer is the last player standing." They also can't vote and don't count towards the majority vote count. You can only use this ability once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you. Minions from the second ability don't count and you can win with them.
